articles.author: Stella Qiu
articles.title: Asian shares stumble as US yields advance, dollar buoyant - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares stumbled on Thursday as U.S. bonds yields hit nine-month peaks and pushed the dollar higher, while investors waited anxiously to see if results from Apple and Amazon justified the tech sector's sky-high valuations.
